source.a39db191:
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
plt.style.use('fivethirtyeight')
source.3ec92905:
data = pd.read_csv('../input/volcanoes-on-earth-in-2021/volcanoes around the world in 2021.csv')
data.head()
source.0c79afc9:
#Checkingg which region has the highest number of volcanoes
x = data['Region'].value_counts().index.tolist()
y = data['Region'].value_counts().values.tolist()
plt.figure(figsize=(15,12))
bar = sns.barplot(x =y,y = x,color = 'yellow',edgecolor = 'red')
patch_h = []    
for patch in bar.patches:
    reading = patch.get_height()
    patch_h.append(reading)
    
idx_tallest = np.argmax(patch_h)
bar.patches[idx_tallest].set_facecolor('#F2003C')
plt.title('Region of volcanoes')
plt.xlabel('Count')
plt.ylabel('Regions')
plt.show()
source.a0ecb90b:
value = data['Country'].value_counts().head(20)
x = value.index
y = value.values
plt.figure(figsize=(15,12))
bar =sns.barplot(x = y,y = x ,color = 'yellow',edgecolor = 'red' )
patch_h = []    
for patch in bar.patches:
    reading = patch.get_height()
    patch_h.append(reading)
    
idx_tallest = np.argmax(patch_h)
bar.patches[idx_tallest].set_facecolor('#F2003C')

plt.xlabel('Count')
plt.ylabel('Country')
plt.title('Countries of volcanoes')
plt.show()
source.ba85f15c:
plt.figure(figsize=(15,12))
sns.histplot(x = data['Elevation (m)'],color = 'Yellow' , edgecolor = 'red')
plt.title('Distribution of Elevation')
plt.show()
source.fbdf9aa7:
#Top  5 Locations with highest number of volcanoes
labels = data['Location'].value_counts().head(5).keys()
explode = (0.2,0.1,0.1,0.1,0.1)
def my_fmt(x):
    return '{:.4f}%\n({:.0f})'.format(x, total*x/100)
colors = ['#F2003C','#ec5300','#ec9b00','#ecca00','#FF6E4A']
total = len(data['Location'].value_counts())
plt.figure(figsize=(15,12))
plt.pie(x = data['Location'].value_counts().head(5),
        labels = labels,
        explode = explode,
        shadow = True,
       autopct=my_fmt,
       colors = colors)
centre_circle = plt.Circle((0, 0), 0.70, fc='white')
fig = plt.gcf()
fig.gca().add_artist(centre_circle)
plt.title('Location of volcanoes')
plt.show()
source.1cd4791d:
x = data['Type'].value_counts().index.tolist()
y = data['Type'].value_counts().values.tolist()
plt.figure(figsize=(15,12))
bar =sns.barplot(x =y,y = x,color = 'yellow',edgecolor = 'red')
patch_h = []    
for patch in bar.patches:
    reading = patch.get_height()
    patch_h.append(reading)
    
idx_tallest = np.argmax(patch_h)
bar.patches[idx_tallest].set_facecolor('#F2003C')

plt.xlabel('Count')
plt.ylabel('Type of volcanoes')
plt.title('Type of volcanoes')
plt.show()
source.eec8ee88:
labels = data['Status'].value_counts().head(5).keys()
explode = (0.2,0.1,0.1,0.1,0.1)
def my_fmt(x):
    return '{:.4f}%\n({:.0f})'.format(x, total*x/100)
colors = ['#F2003C','#ec5300','#ec9b00','#ecca00','#FF6E4A']
total = len(data['Status'].value_counts())
plt.figure(figsize=(15,12))
plt.pie(x = data['Status'].value_counts().head(5),
        labels = labels,
        explode = explode,
        shadow = True,
       autopct=my_fmt,
       colors = colors)
centre_circle = plt.Circle((0, 0), 0.75, fc='white')
fig = plt.gcf()
fig.gca().add_artist(centre_circle)
plt.title('Status')
plt.show()
